modName: FR and ENG - Sugar Canes Crossed Shield of Setvi - Skyrim
summary:
This mod add a standalone Sugar Canes Crossed Shield, with a Sugar Canes Crossed symbol.
This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.

For the stats, please look at the pictures.
Craft: at forge under steel section.

Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]This mod add a standalone Sugar Canes Crossed Shield, with a Sugar Canes Crossed symbol.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]This mod come in .BSA version ; in French and English.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]For the stats, please look at the pictures.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Craft: at forge under steel section.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Thanks to Abakus and thanks to you.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Sorry for the ugly Sugar (Free, haha) Canes Crossed symbol.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]No DLC or no other mods are required.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]I used the modders ressource I've found here:
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5916/?]A Steel Heater Shield by Abakus
[/url][/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]I'm not sure but this mod - maybe - doesn't work with any other mod who use the HeaterShield.esp or .dds textures - not tested atm.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Since I start in a new job, I've no time to mod/update/play at Skyrim.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]A very Merry Christmas to all of you. Un très joyeux Noël à chacun de vous.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Sorry for my bad English.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]____________
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Thanks, Setvi.
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]My others mods:
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2764642/?tb=mods&pUp=1]SETVI's account User Files.
[/url][/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4]
[/size][/color][/u][/b][b][u][color=#6aa84f][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url]

[img]http://imalbum.aufeminin.com/album/D20090704/571828_Z4ZD4FCQY78L4SHYRR6781GK35E62V_chat-1_H120454_L.jpg[/img]
[youtube]rUwdlEjo4ag[/youtube]
[youtube]MejBGKM-6Ss[/youtube]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-2-1444644960.png[/img]
[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72187-9-1451053482.jpg[/img][/size][/color][/u][/b][/center]
